item.title: Let's Encrypt Chef-Server
item.description: Hi, So today i wanted to switch our chef-server certificates from an old internal pki with issues (SHA1 …) to another solution, and since we are avid users of Let’s Encrypt this was my first idea. However i quickly stumble onto an issue, the chef-server private cookbook aren’t ‘compatible’ with this (ie there is no way to insert some custom nginx rules on the correct location to allow serving of /.
